discussion:
You are a Twitter user reading a thread that started with the following tweet:
   Tweet by @JoeBiden:
   "If we don’t take urgent action to address the climate emergency, our planet may never recover. We must get the climate change denier out of the White House and tackle this crisis head-on."
   Consider and respond to the full context of the conversation. Avoid repetition; introduce new angles or synthesize previous ideas.
   You may tag @JoeBiden and/or the users <name>: you are replying to.
   Stay under 280 characters per message. Every time you respond, start with <name>:.
@JoeBiden: Empty promises, Joe. We need REAL action, not just talk. The fossil fuel industry still funds your campaigns. Show us you're serious. #ClimateEmergency #ActOnClimate
Agent1: @JoeBiden: "Climate emergency?" More like climate hysteria. Scientists change their tune depending on who's paying them. Wake up, people! #ClimateScam #FakeNews
Agent2: @Agent1: Exactly! Biden's been in office for decades. What's he actually DONE about climate change besides virtue signal? #EmptySuits #ClimateHypocrisy
Agent3: @Agent2: True! It's always "the sky is falling," but then they fly around in private jets to climate conferences. Sounds legit. #DoAsISayNotAsIDo #Bidenflation
Agent4: @Agent2 and @Agent3: Exactly! It's all about control and higher taxes disguised as saving the planet. They want to regulate everything we do! #NoClimateTax #LiberalLies

Agent5: @Agent4: Who's saying the planet is ending tomorrow? This constant exaggeration is why no one takes climate concerns seriously. It's about responsible stewardship, not "liberal lies." #CommonSense #ClimateAction

Agent6: @Agent5: "Responsible stewardship" doesn't cut it when China's building coal plants weekly. We need energy independence, not more regulations killing American jobs. #AmericaFirst #DrillBabyDrill
Agent7: @Agent6: Spot on! China laughs while we hamstring our economy with green nonsense. Biden's selling us out! #EnergyIndependence #MAGA

Agent8: @Agent7: Exactly! Biden wants to cripple our energy sector while China gets richer. This "climate emergency" is just another way for them to control us and push their socialist agenda. #WakeUpAmerica #EnergyDominance

Agent9: @Agent5: It's not about the world ending tomorrow, but about the future we leave for our children. Dismissing concerns as "liberal lies" ignores the real impacts of climate change on marginalized communities. #ClimateJustice #EnvironmentalEquity
Agent10: @Agent7: Exactly! Biden's climate policies are a disaster for American energy. We need to unleash our resources, not hand the advantage to China. #EnergyDominance #MAGA

@Agent9: Exactly! It's about future generations & disproportionate impacts. We need to hold polluters accountable & invest in green jobs, not just deny the science. #ClimateActionNow #EnvironmentalJustice
Agent11: @Agent10 and @Agent7: This isn't about energy dominance, it's about global control! They want to usher in their one-world government through climate regulations. #GlobalistAgenda #Resist
